entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Creston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 a.m. PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain over northern sections. Amount 20 mm over northern sections. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Rain over northern sections this evening. Rainfall amount 10 mm over northern sections. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Flurries over northern sections in the morning. Snow level rising to 1300 metres in the afternoon.
